access_denied__ask_your_admin: Ask the administrator to give you access to this page.
access_denied__or_notify_a_bug: If you think it is a mistake in FacturaScripts, don't hesitate to notify it. Click the help button, at top right and report the error.
access_denied__you_cant_access_to_this_p: You don't have permission to access this page.
admin_empresa__allow_less_secure_certifi: Allowing unsafe server certificates: self-signed certificates are commonplace on dedicated, but unsafe servers. Enable this option if you can't connect to your mail server even if the data is correct.
admin_empresa__help_for_configure_more_o: In order to configure the other options of the company you must install the facturacion_base plugin.
admin_empresa__help_for_loading: If you have problems configuring the loading.es email, use port 25 and TLS encryption.
admin_empresa__help_for_your_own_email: Do you want to use yourname@yourcompany.com? Free trial Google Apps for Work
admin_empresa__help_send_copies: You can write an email to send copy of everything.
admin_empresa__msg_error_cant_connect_to: Couldn't connect via email. Is the password correct?
admin_empresa__msg_error_ext_openssl_not: Can't find the OpenSSL extension, essential for sending emails.
admin_empresa__msg_error_gmail_explanati: Although the gmail password is correct, in certain situations the gmail servers block the connection. To overcome this situation, you must create and use a application password
admin_empresa__title_if_not_gmail: If you don't use Gmail or Google Apps, fill in also this data
admin_home__admins_can_always_access: Administrators can access from any IP.
admin_home__check_column_types: Check the types of table columns
admin_home__clean_cache_to_start_checks: You'll need to clean the cache for the checks to begin.
admin_home__controler_not_found_or_disab: Controller not found or belongs to an inactive plugin
admin_home__danger_no_touch: Danger: Don't touch if you don't know what you do.
admin_home__help_add_plugin: If you have a plugin in a .zip file, you can upload it and install it from here.
admin_home__help_currency_symbol: Decimal and decimal and thousands separator settings apply only to print lists and formats. For the editable fields, the operating system configuration is used.
admin_home__help_development: These are sensitive configuration parameters of FacturaScripts. don't modify them if you don't know what you do.
admin_home__help_facturascripts_core_ins: You already have the core installed. As you can see, the core allows you to manage pages, plugins and users. Press continue to continue with the installation.
admin_home__help_integer_type: Type to use in the database (MySQL).
admin_home__help_plugins:
The core only handles the management of users, plugins and pages. For everything else you have the plugins. In the Downloads tab you have available the main plugins. Choose those you need. There is everything and the list is updated periodically.
The installed plugins are in the plugins tab. You can add plugins manually, if you wish, and you can also enable or disable them, even delete them.
In addition, all basic invoicing and accounting has been moved to the facturacion_base plugin. You can download it automatically and install it by pressing this button.
admin_home__help_server_accepts_filesize: This server supports a maximum size of %1$s MB. If the plugin occupies more, it will fail to upload, even may not output anything.
admin_home__invoices_translations: INVOICE and INVOICES are translated only in the sales documents. SIMPLIFIED_INVOICE is used in the tickets.
admin_home__language_translation_credits: Here's your name as a translation contributor;)
admin_home__msg_deleted_page_without_con: The %1$s page was automatically deleted since it doesn't have an associated controller in the controller folder.
admin_home__msg_demo_no_changes_1_alert: In the demo mode, no changes can be made on this page.
admin_home__msg_demo_no_changes_2_alert: If you like FacturaScripts and want to know more, check out the questions section.
admin_home__msg_error_cant_write_plugins: You don't have write permissions on folder plugins/%1$s
admin_home__msg_error_downloading_plugin: Error downloading. You will have to manually download it from here and add it from the plugins tab.
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_delet: You don't have permission to delete plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_downl: You don't have permission to download plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_not_perms_to_uploa: You don't have permission to upload plugins.
admin_home__msg_error_only_admin_can: Only an administrator can make changes on this page.
admin_home__msg_error_zip_not_found: File not Found. Do you weigh more than %1$s MB? That's the limit you have configured on your server.
admin_home__msg_now_you_can_conf_plugin: You can now configure the plugin.
admin_home__msg_pages_auto_disabled: The following pages have been automatically deleted: %1$s.
admin_home__msg_pages_auto_enabled: The following pages have been automatically enabled: %1$s.
admin_home__msg_plugin_name_added: Plugin %1$s added correctly. You can activate it now.
admin_home__msg_reset: Setup restarted successfully, press here to continue.
admin_home__no_plugins_installed: You don't have any plugins installed.
admin_home__only_on_mysql: It can only be disabled in MySQL.
admin_home__question_delete_plugin: Do you really want to delete this plugin?
admin_home__question_download_unstable_p: This plugin is marked as unstable Are you sure you want to download it?
admin_home__title_unstable: Unstable: don't install it unless you know what you do
admin_info__help_eneboo: FacturaScripts is compatible with the official Eneboo 2.3 modules, but not with the dozens of customizations out there. If you need modifications, look for a FacturaScripts Partner.
admin_info__help_info: Here you have basic information about this installation of FacturaScripts, database, list of tables and history of errors with multiple filters, to facilitate your work in finding a fault.
admin_info__help_plugin_sql_editor: Remember that you can use the sql_editor plugin to make sql queries in the database.
admin_info__msg_cron_never_executed: The cron has never been run, you'll miss some cool features FacturaScripts.
admin_info__msg_error_with_cron: It seems that there was an error with the cron. Click here to correct it.
admin_orden_menu__help_how_to_move: Click and hold to move the menu entries.
admin_orden_menu__help_order_menu: Order freely the entries of each menu. When finished, press Save.
admin_rol__press_to_regenerate: Press Apply to regenerate user permissions.
admin_rol__question_delete_rol: Do you really want to delete the role #%1$s?
admin_rol__user_can_delete_on_page: The user has permissions to delete on this page
admin_user__admin_has_full_access: Administrators have access to any page.
admin_user__confirm_delete_user: Do you really want to delete the user?
admin_user__create_employee_and_assign: Create a new employee and assign this user
admin_user__help_new_employee_and_assign: An employee will be created and assigned to this user.
admin_user__help_system_info: You can see more details from Admin > System Information.
admin_user__msg_demo_only_edit_your_user: In demo mode you can only modify the user's data. This is so to avoid bad practices among users who test the demo.
admin_user__msg_not_allowed_to_modify: You don't have permission to edit this data.
admin_user__msg_only_admin_can: Only an administrator can create and assign an employee from here.
admin_user__msg_user_cant_access_pages: You have not authorized this user to access any page and therefore you will not be able to do anything. You can give access to any page from the authorize tab.
admin_users__can_view_edit_delete_on: %1$s can view, modify, and delete in %2$s
admin_users__can_view_edit_not_delete_on: %1$s can view and modify in %2$s, but not delete
admin_users__help_anon_login: Install the login_anonimo plugin so that the list of users doesn't appear in the login screen.
admin_users__help_permissions: Here you can quickly see which users are allowed to access each page. In highlighted those who have permissions to view, modify and delete, the rest have only permissions to view and modify.
admin_users__help_roles: Roles allow you to define permission packages to quickly apply to users, instead of going one by one.
admin_users__help_users: You can have employees who don't have access to FacturaScripts, or users who are not employees, so it is separated.
admin_users__msg_admin_only_create_users: Only an administrator can create users.
admin_users__msg_demo_cant_delete_user: In demo mode users can't be deleted. This is so to avoid bad practices among users who test the demo.
admin_users__msg_only_admin_can_delete_u: Only an administrator can delete users.
agente__msg_error_employee_name_less_50_: The employee name can't exceed 50 characters.
agente__msg_error_employee_surname_less_: The employee's surname can't exceed 100 characters.
api__no_api_version: Absence of FacturaScripts API Version. Updates the client.
api__update_facturascripts: Incorrect FacturaScripts API version. Updates the client.
cron__cant_connect_database: Unable to connect to the database!
cron__cron_still_working: ERROR: There is already a cron running. If you think this is a bug, go to Admin > System information to solve the problem.
cron__executing_plugin_cron:
***********************
We run cron.php from the plugin %1$s
default__select_user_to_login: You must select your user and enter the password to access the system.
default__welcome_facturascripts_demo: Welcome to the demo of FacturaScripts, type your email to continue:
divisa__msg_error_conversion_rate_not_0_: The conversion rate for purchases can't be 0.
ejercicio__msg_error_data_out_of_range: The selected date is outside the exercise range. A better one was selected.
ejercicio__msg_error_startdate_before_en: The start date (%1$s) is after the end date (%2$s).
ejercicio__msg_exercise_incorrect_accoun: The exercise is unbalanced at the level of seats. Must: %1$s | Haber: %2$s
ejercicio__msg_exercise_incorrect_not_ac: But NO is not squared at the seat level. Must: %1$s | Haber: %2$s
ejercicio__msg_exercise_incorrect_subacc: The exercise is uneven at the sub-account level. Must: %1$s | Haber: %2$s
empresa__msg_error_resumed_company_name_: The short name %1$s must be shorter than the name.
feedback__help_help: Details your doubt or problem if you want it answered.
feedback__help_you_have_updates: You have pending updates. Updates correct bugs and add new features. You will not receive support on the web unless you upgrade.
footer__a_lot_of_plugins: More than 50 plugins with a very active development.
footer__help_demo_facturascripts: This demo give you a quick idea of ​​how FacturaScripts works, with a small number of active plugins and many options deactivated. Keep in mind that there are dozens of people using this demo at same time.
footer__list_work_anywhere: Work from any PC, tablet or smartphone.
footer__professional_support: Professional support at your disposal through the Partners.
footer__simply_forms: Simple forms with the essential options.
fs_user__msg_created_default_admin_accou: The admin user was created with the admin password.
fs_user__msg_invalid_user_nick: Nick '%1$s' is invalid. Must be between 3 and 12 characters, worth numbers or letters, but not Ñ nor accents.
fs_user__msg_pass_between_1_32_chars: The password must be between 1 and 32 characters.
fscache__msg_error_conexion: Failed to connect to Memcache server.
fscache__msg_instalar_memcache: Memcache class not found. You must install Memcache and activate it in php.ini
fscontroller__msg_cookie_no_valida_ip: Invalid cookie! Someone has accessed this account from another PC with IP: %1$s. If it was you, ignore this message.
fscontroller__msg_ip_baneada: Your IP has been banned. You will have to wait 10 minutes before trying again.
fscontroller__msg_ip_baneada_usuario: Your IP was banned %1$s. You will have to wait 10 minutes before trying again.
fscontroller__msg_ip_blocked: You can't access from this IP.
fscontroller__msg_nueva_password_usuario: You have to enter a new password %1$s
fscontroller__msg_password_incorrecta_us: The password for the database is incorrect %1$s
fscontroller__msg_required_php_version: FacturaScripts needs PHP 5.3 or higher, and you have PHP %1$s.
fscontroller__user_cerrado_sesion: The user has closed the session
fsmysql__cant_convert_to_innodb: Unable to convert table '%1$s' to InnoDB. Imprescindible for FacturaScripts.
fsmysql__error_consulta: Error executing query %1$s: %2$s. The sequence occupies the position %3$s.
fsmysql__ext_mysql_not_installed: You don't have the PHP extension for MySQL installed.
fspostgresql__ext_psql_not_installed: You don't have the PHP extension for PostgreSQL installed.
header__meta_description: FacturaScripts is a billing and accounting software for SMEs. It is free software under the GNU/LGPL license.
index__answer_are_you_a_new_developer: Then I commented that what happened is that I can't find the %1$s.php file, which should be in the controller directory of your plugin.
index__answer_did_you_disabled_plugins: It may fail to delete menu entries. Go to Admin > Control Panel > Menu and press Save. It will remove menu entries from pages that are no longer active.
index__answer_did_you_reinstall: You will have access to pages of plugins that are not active in the menu. Go to Admin > Control Panel > Menu and press Save. It will remove menu entries from pages that are no longer active.
index__answer_did_you_update_from_factur: The system has changed a lot, now the plugins have an independent development.
Delete the old plugins and follow the Admin > Control Panel.
index__cant_write_tmp_folder: You can't write to the tmp folder of FacturaScripts
index__help_controller_not_found: The controller for this page is not found. Check with the administrator.
index__help_if_you_think_its_a_bug: If you think it is an error in FacturaScripts, don't hesitate to notify it. Click the help button
index__help_notify_me: And report the error. Try not to ignore important information: Have you updated from FacturaScripts 2014 or earlier? Are you from Eneboo/Abanq? Have you reinstalled the beast? They are important questions when looking for a mistake.
index__question_are_you_a_new_developer: Are you a developer and are you trying to make a plugin?
index__question_did_you_update_from_fact: Have you updated from FacturaScripts 2014 or earlier?
install__cant_write_on_facturascripts_fo: The FacturaScripts folder doesn't have write permissions. These permissions are necessary for the system of templates, install plugins, updates, etc...
install__error_connecting_database: Unable to connect to the database. Check your username and password.
install__help_database_socket: Only in some hostings it is necessary to specify the MySQL socket.
install__help_distributions: The default setting of these distributions, exactly SELinux, blocks any attempt to check if the folder has write permissions. Disables or modifies the SELinux configuration for the correct operation of FacturaScripts.
install__help_hosting: Try to give write permissions from the FTP client or from the cPanel.
install__help_hosting_trimmed_php: Some hosting providers offer overly trimmed versions of PHP. It is best that you look for a more complete hosting provider, which is the majority. Check out our Recommended Hostings section.
install__help_license:
FacturaScripts also includes a modified RainTPL license that is also licensed LGPL as well as phpmailer with the same license LGPL.
For the graphic part is included the Bootstrap framework, licensed MIT and font-awesome also licensed MIT.
And last but not least, it also includes jQuery, licensed MIT.
install__help_linux: This command solves the problem in 95% of cases, but you can opt for a more restrictive solution, it is simply necessary for Apache (or PHP) to read and write to the folder.
install__help_memcached: This section is totally optional. If you have memcached installed, you can specify here the path, port and prefix to use. If not, leave it as is.
install__help_openssl: FacturaScripts needs the OpenSSL extension to be able to download plugins, updates and send emails.
install__help_openssl_linux: It is very rare that a proper installation of PHP on Linux doesn't include OpenSSL. Try to install the php-openssl package with your package manager and restart Apache. For more information consult the help or the Linux distribution forums that you use.
install__help_openssl_mac: It is rare that an Apache + PHP + MySQL for Mac package doesn't include OpenSSL. We offer several packages with everything needed in our Downloads section.
install__help_php_version_1_point: Many hostings offer several versions of PHP. Go to your hosting control panel and select the highest PHP version.
install__help_php_version_2_point: Look for a more complete hosting provider, which is the majority. Check out our Recommended Hostings
install__help_us:
Remember that you have the help menu at the top right. If you encounter any problems, click on Report error... and describe your question, suggestion or error that you have encountered. We don't know how to make perfect software, but with your help we can get closer and closer ;-)

And remember that you have a section dedicated to installation in our official documentation:
install__help_use_this_form_for_help: Use this form to inform us. Additional information such as the version of FacturaScripts you use, list of active plugins, PHP version, etc...
install__help_ziparchive: FacturaScripts needs the ZipArchive extension to be able to unzip plugins and updates.
install__install_phpxml: Linux: install php-xml package and restart Apache.
install__obsolete_php: FacturaScripts needs PHP 5.3 or higher. You are using version %1$s.
install__official_package_for_windows: We offer a version of FacturaScripts for Windows with all the necessary software (like OpenSSL) already included as standard. You can find it in our Downloads section.
install__point_isnt_the_default_decimal_: The decimal separator of this version of PHP is not the point, as it happens in standard installations. You must correct it.
install__required_mbstring: FacturaScripts needs the mbstring extension to be able to work with non-European characters (Chinese, Korean, Japanese and Russian).
install__required_mbstring_instructions: Install the php-mbstring package and restart Apache.
install__simplexml_not_found: The simplexml extension can't be found in your PHP installation. You must install or activate it.
install__unofficial_package_for_windows: If you decide to use a different packaging, and it doesn't include what is necessary, you should look for help in the forums or the support of the creators of that packaging.
no_db__answer_1_installed_on_hosting: %1$s was blocked. Contact your provider to restart.
no_db__answer_1_installed_on_pc: %1$s was disconnected. To fix it, you must restart %1$s. If you are using Portable FacturaScripts, go to the FacturaScripts folder, click xampp-control and hit the start button, next to %1$s.
no_db__answer_2_installed_on_hosting: You have exceeded the hosting fee. Many hosts have usage limits in the database, and if they exceed you block them.
no_db__answer_2_installed_on_pc: You have changed the password for the database. To solve this, you must reset the original password of the database, or put the new password in the file Config.php of FacturaScripts.
no_db__help_cant_connect_database: Unable to connect to the database. The reasons are usually different depending on where you have FacturaScripts installed.
updater__config_not_found: config.php file not found. You can't upgrade before install.
updater__delayed_fro_problems: Postposed check of plugins updates until you resolve the problems.
updater__dont_know_your_keys: Don't know what is your key? You can check it by clicking the View my keys button.
updater__help_adminlte: We have worked on a new design to give a more modern look to FacturaScripts, with a new side menu, integrated search engine, more user visibility, more and better icons and a long etcetera. This is the result.
updater__help_improvements: We have a number of improvements in the oven that may interest you, but need financing. Do you sign up? You only need 5€.
updater__help_updater: This updater allows updating both the core of FacturaScripts and its plugins, including purchased and private plugins. If there is a core update you will have to update it before you can see if there are also plugins updates.
updater__msg_error_downloading_zip_try_l:
Error downloading zip file.
Please try again in a few minutes.
updater__msg_error_with_zip: There was an error with the update.zip file. Code: %1$s. Please try again in a few minutes.
updater__msg_error_with_zip_try_later:
There was an error with the update.zip file.
Please try again in a few minutes.
updater__need_solve_errors: You have to correct these errors before continuing.
updater__system_is_updated: The system is up to date.
